class_notes: EMPH Students Only. All others must contact ADAP for permission to enroll.
course_description: Pre-Requisites: BSHES 504D, PRS 532D and PRS 535D and PRS 575D as prerequisite or special permission required to enroll. This course will provide an overview of program evaluation, using an applied case study approach. Course assignments include required reading, analysis of case study examples and the development of an actual evaluation plan for an evaluation client.
prerequisites: BSHES 504D and PRS 532D and PRS 535D and PRS 575D as prerequisite or special permission required to enroll.
